attributes.action: Explain exactly how the government reacts to these petitions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lots of petitions, but I never see anything 'positive' from the government saying that it might be a godo idea. Even when half a million or more sign up. Either explain in detail why the government will or won't take notice of these, how, and under what circumstances (what's a threshold number of signees for 'success' for example), or stop the petition process altogether.

rejection.details: If you have any comments about the e-petition process please direct them to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
